title: can't buy rune page for days

replies.body: dont buy lmao. rune pages trash.

Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If it's a widespread issue that doesn't yet have a fix, they'll be able to tell you and possibly manually process the transaction. If it's an issue they're unaware of it will help them track it. They may also just be able to give you a straight-up solution.

As a side note, have you tried running a client repair? If not, do so.
Same problem here, exact same message. I hope it gets fixed soon because Im getting increasingly annoyed at it.
